trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_SEQ_00<tab>Alisaie is eager to get on with the task.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_TODO_01<tab>Survey the area.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_TODO_02<tab>Survey the area.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>I'm pleased to see that the villagers are no longer wary of us. I shall take the opportunity to ask about Mt. Gulg.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>Yet another hapless soul that Alphinaud saved from mortal danger, I see. Some things never change.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>At any rate, it seems that Brother has a mind to linger. Meanwhile, I have a mind for us to explore.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALISAIE_000_022<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I are going to scout out the area. We'll be back in a while.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALPHINAUD_000_023<tab>O-Oh? Very well, then. Just take care out there.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Take care out there. If you sense even the slightest danger, pray turn back at once.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>The path diverges. Let's split up so we can cover more ground. I'll go east if you would be so kind as to head west.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>We can aim to meet at the foot of the mountain, taking note of what we see along the way. In a short while, then.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You are under attack!
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>Soon after you left, who should arrive in Amity but Urianger and the Exarch. I'm glad they were able to find you.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_THANCRED_000_065<tab>I'm told you went ahead to scout out the volcano. I don't suppose some grappling hooks will suffice?
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_RYNE_000_070<tab>A-All that grinding and shaking... I-I was afraid the lift floor would fall out from underneath me...
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_RYNE_000_071<tab>B-But don't worry! I-I'm sure the trembling will go away s-soon!
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_URIANGER_000_075<tab>Thus are we all gathered...though Ryne, I am afeared, did not much enjoy the ascent.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_YSHTOLA_000_080<tab>Forgive us our delay. The Exarch arrived and we took some time to apprise him of our mission.

TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_MYSTERYVOICE_000_085<tab>...Concerned for my health, are you? Indeed, we are a little far from the Crystarium, but rest assured this old man can muster up another wind for what is to come.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_CHAINUZZ_000_090<tab>Oh, don't mind us. We're just taking in the sights.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_DULIACHAI_000_095<tab>Ahhh, such an exhilarating ride! And such a magnificent view! Nothing in Eulmore compares to this!
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>Hm... I didn't expect to see the Chais here. Though I suppose it's well within their rights.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALISAIE_000_101<tab>At any rate, it's time to tackle our next little obstacle: finding a way to reach Mt. Gulg.
TEXT_LUCKME106_03635_ALISAIE_000_102<tab>For this, we'll need to put all our heads together...
